pages.text: $(li)Flares are flying creatures that doesn't summon normally.$(br)$(li)You have to hit a Phantom with a Splash $(l:patchouli:potions/upgrade_aquatic/insomnia)Potion of Insomnia$(/l) or with a Arrow of Insomnia to transform it into a Flare.$(br)$(li)These creatures will attack Phantoms, so you can use them to defend your base of those annoying creatures.
On death, like the Phantom, Flares may drop Phantom Membrane.
